data.field: so often that I've lost track more than 100 times a day 51 to 100 times a day 25 to 50 times a day 1 to 24 times a day every hour on the hour less than 24 times a day less than 7 times a week less than 4 times a month less than 12 times a year I can't recall the last time I laughed not often enough never other
